Description: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

Name: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
Description: Princes who have been turned into Dwarfs seek the red shoes of a lady in order to break the spell, although it will not be easy. A parody with a twist.

Name: Doctor Dolittle
Description: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

Name: Around the World in 80 Days
Description: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor, beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.

Name: The Sleepover
Description: When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

Name: Little Giants
Description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

Name: The Polar Express
Description: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
Description: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

Name: PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie
Description: A magical meteor crash lands in Adventure City, and gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into The Mighty Pups

Name: Penguins of Madagascar
Description: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

Name: Planes
Description: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

Name: Titan A.E.
Description: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Name: Lady and the Tramp
Description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

Name: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
Description: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

Name: Agent Cody Banks
Description: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Name: The Jungle Book
Description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Name: Secret Society of Second Born Royals
Description: Follows Sam's adventures at a top-secret training program for a new class of second-born royals tasked with saving the world.

Name: Artemis Fowl
Description: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.

Name: The Haunted Mansion
Description: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
Description: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami.--and dump them. They have three days to get to him and save themselves not only from losing Dave but also from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

Name: Something from Tiffany's
Description: Follows a woman as her life gets upended when an engagement ring that was for someone else leads her to the person she's meant to be with.

Name: Kazaam
Description: A troubled kid inadvertently releases a genie, who must grant him any three wishes he requests.

Name: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
Description: The Bakers find themselves competing with a rival family of eight children while on vacation.

Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
Description: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.

Name: Inspector Gadget
Description: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

Name: RV
Description: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Name: Swiss Family Robinson
Description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

Name: The Grinch
Description: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Name: The Karate Kid Part II
Description: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
Description: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

Name: An American Tail
Description: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

Name: Epic Tails
Description: Life in Yolcos, a beautiful and prosperous port city in ancient Greece, is peaceful until the population is threatened by the wrath of Poseidon. A young, adventurous mouse and the cat who adopted her help the aged Jason and his Argonauts in their quest to save the city.

Name: 3 Ninjas
Description: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

Name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
Description: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

Name: The Thundermans Return
Description: It centers on the family as they begin a new era of superhero crimefighting. When one save goes wrong, the Thundermans are sent back to Hiddenville.

Name: The Lego Ninjago Movie
Description: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

Name: Big Fat Liar
Description: Fourteen-year-old Jason Shepherd has a reputation for stretching the truth. So, when big-time Hollywood producer Marty Wolf steals his class paper and turns it into a smash hit movie, no one believes Jason's latest tall tale.

Name: The Rescuers Down Under
Description: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Name: Elio
Description: Elio struggles to fit in until he is transported by aliens and becomes the chosen one to be Earth's galactic ambassador while his mother Olga works on the top secret project to decode alien messages.

Name: The Sword in the Stone
Description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

Name: Blank Check
Description: After a bike accident, a young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters it belongs to are in pursuit.

Name: National Treasure 3
Description: The plot is unknown at this time.

Name: Gnomeo & Juliet
Description: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?

Name: Easter Under Wraps
Description: Erin Cavendish goes undercover at her family's chocolate plant to see why sales are down when she meets head chocolatier, Bryan, who has new ideas on how to update the Easter product line.

Name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
Description: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

Name: The Beverly Hillbillies
Description: Nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil. He and his kin move to posh Beverly Hills.

Name: Richie Rich
Description: A rich young boy finds his family the target of an inside job, and must use his cunning to save them.

Name: Over the Moon
Description: In this animated musical, a girl builds a rocket ship and blasts off, hoping to meet a mythical moon goddess.

Name: Cheaper by the Dozen
Description: The raucous exploits of a blended family of 12, the Bakers, as they navigate a hectic home life while simultaneously managing their family business.

Name: TMNT
Description: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

Name: The Cat Returns
Description: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

Name: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again
Description: Nick Daley hesitates becoming a museum nightwatchman and Kahmunrah returns to conquer the world.

Name: Home Alone 3
Description: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

Name: The Black Cauldron
Description: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

Name: The Pagemaster
Description: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.

Name: The House with a Clock in Its Walls
Description: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

Name: Smurfs: The Lost Village
Description: In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy, and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

Name: Flubber
Description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

Name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
Description: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

Name: Osmosis Jones
Description: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

Name: Sleepover
Description: Desperate to improve their social status, four best friends enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.

Name: Barnyard
Description: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

Name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Description: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Name: The Ice Age Adventures of Buck Wild
Description: The Ice Age Adventures of Buck Wild continues the escapades of the possum brothers Crash and Eddie who set out to find a place of their own. Together with the one-eyed weasel, Buck Wild, they face the dinosaurs who inhabit the Lost World.

Name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Description: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

Name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
Description: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

Name: Explorers
Description: A boy obsessed with '50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

Name: Abominable
Description: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

Name: Problem Child
Description: A young boy just short of a monster is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.

Name: Leo
Description: A 74-year-old lizard named Leo and his turtle friend decide to escape from the terrarium of a Florida school classroom where they have been living for decades.

Name: Leap!
Description: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera House.

Name: The Brave Little Toaster
Description: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

Name: Baby Geniuses
Description: Scientists hold super intelligent talking babies captive, but things take a turn for the worse when a mix-up occurs between a baby genius and its twin.

Name: Bugsy Malone
Description: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

Name: Camp Nowhere
Description: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

Name: It Takes Two
Description: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

Name: Winnie the Pooh
Description: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

Name: Are We There Yet?
Description: To impress a foxy divorcee, ladies' man Nick offers to take her kids on an extended road trip, unaware of the torture he's in for.

Name: Race to Witch Mountain
Description: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a U.F.O. expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

Name: Herbie Fully Loaded
Description: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Herbie, Number 53, the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own, puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

Name: Coyote v. Acme
Description: A story set in the ACME warehouse, the manufacturer of anything and everything used by the Looney Tunes characters.

Name: The Addams Family 2
Description: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters. Sequel to the 2019 animated film, 'The Addams Family'.

Name: Bratz
Description: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body President, who wants to split them up into different social cliques.

Name: Song of the South
Description: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.

Name: The Tiger's Apprentice
Description: The story centers on a normal boy, Tom, who gets drawn into this world against his wishes when his eccentric grandmother who he lives with in San Francisco's Chinatown turns out to be the guardian of the phoenix egg. When his grandmother perishes in battle and is spirited away in a ghost cart, Tom must apprentice with an unlikely mentor - a tiger, Mr. Hu - to learn an... Read all

Name: Arthur and the Invisibles
Description: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Description: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

Name: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
Description: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Name: St. Trinian's
Description: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

Name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
Description: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

Name: The Great Mouse Detective
Description: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

Name: School of Magical Animals
Description: Ida must transfer to a new school, where she soon realizes the students are unkind to each other. However, that all changes when a new teacher, Miss Cornfield, begins to educate them on the value of friendship and magic.

Name: My Little Pony: A New Generation
Description: After the time of the Mane 6, Sunny--a young Earth Pony--and her new Unicorn friend Izzy explore their world and strive to restore Harmony to Equestria.

Name: Dunston Checks In
Description: A young boy befriends a larcenous orangutan in a luxury hotel.

Name: Fireheart
Description: Sixteen-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the world's first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. The Mayor of New York calls Georgia's father Shawn out of retirement to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save her city, Georgia disguises h... Read all

Name: Paddington 3
Description: Plot undisclosed. The third installment of the Paddington films.

Name: Monster Trucks
Description: A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

Name: Mr. Bean's Holiday
Description: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.

Name: The NeverEnding Story III
Description: A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.

Name: Jungle 2 Jungle
Description: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

Name: The Fantastic Four
Description: When dosed with cosmic rays, four intrepid explorers are given incredible powers.

Name: Fantastic Voyage
Description: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter it.

Name: Zookeeper
Description: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

Name: The Ant Bully
Description: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his water gun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

Name: Mac and Me
Description: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

Name: Clash of the Wolves
Description: A fire in the mountains drive a wolf pack into a nearby desert where they will terrorize the local residents.

Name: Rally Road Racers
Description: Racers compete in a high-stakes rally along the famous Silk Road trade route.

Name: Blue's Big City Adventure
Description: Josh and Blue head to New York City to audition for a big Broadway musical.

Name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
Description: In this live-action prequel to The Flintstones (1994), the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma Slaghoople is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.

Name: The Great Race
Description: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

Name: The Smurfs 2
Description: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.

Name: The Muppet Movie
Description: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

Name: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
Description: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

Name: Bean
Description: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

Name: The Peanuts Movie
Description: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

Name: The Willoughbys
Description: Convinced they'd be better off raising themselves, the Willoughby children hatch a sneaky plan to send their selfish parents on vacation. The siblings then embark on their own high-flying adventure to find the true meaning of family.

Name: Astro Boy
Description: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

Name: Around the World in 80 Days
Description: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

Name: Nanny McPhee Returns
Description: Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.

Name: Tooth Fairy
Description: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

Name: Masters of the Universe
Description: He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe, goes against the evil Skeletor to save the planet Eternia and protect the secrets of Castle Grayskull.

Name: Home on the Range
Description: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

Name: Father of the Bride Part II
Description: George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.

Name: Cats & Dogs
Description: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, of which their human owners are blissfully unaware.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
Description: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

Name: ParaNorman
Description: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

Name: Muppets Most Wanted
Description: While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

Name: Stuart Little 2
Description: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Name: Happy Feet Two
Description: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

Name: Quest for Camelot
Description: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Name: Kicking & Screaming
Description: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating.

Name: G-Force
Description: A specially trained squad of guinea pigs is dispatched to stop a diabolical billionaire from taking over the world.

Name: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
Description: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

Name: Spice World
Description: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Name: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
Description: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
Description: When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

Name: Yours, Mine and Ours
Description: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

Name: Raise Your Voice
Description: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

Name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Description: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Name: The Prince and Me
Description: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Name: Angels in the Outfield
Description: The Pittsburgh Pirates' brash and abusive manager receives the help of an angel to win games and become a better person in the process.

Name: Red, White & Brass
Description: When Maka and Veni fail in getting tickets for the most important game of their lives, they decide to form a traditional Tongan marching band, just so they can go to the game. No one in their band of misfits knows anything about marching and they practice using plastic bottles and tin cans for instruments. It is a complete shambles and if they can't get their act toge... Read all

Name: Thumbelina
Description: This retelling of the Hans Christian Andersen classic fairy tale has the digit-sized heroine evading the clutches of various toads, moles, and beetles before she can proceed with her courtship with her dream lover, Prince Cornelius.

Name: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
Description: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

Name: The Boxtrolls
Description: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

Name: Mr. Popper's Penguins
Description: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

Name: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
Description: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

Name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
Description: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

Name: My Father's Dragon
Description: Elmer Elevator searches for a captive Dragon on Wild Island and finds much more than he could ever have anticipated.

Name: My Little Pony: The Movie
Description: After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland.

Name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
Description: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

Name: The Big Green
Description: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texas school, where she coaches the students in soccer, improving their self-esteem and leading to unexpected success.

Name: The Water Horse
Description: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Name: The Spy Next Door
Description: Former C.I.A. spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

Name: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie
Description: When a mysterious stranger arrives from the future with a dire warning, Leo is forced to rise and lead his brothers, Raph, Donnie, and Mikey in a fight to save the world from a terrifying alien species.

Name: Despicable Me 4
Description: Plot unknown. Fourth installment of the 'Despicable Me' franchise.

Name: Yours, Mine & Ours
Description: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widowed handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of his 8 and her 10 children.

Name: Spirit Untamed
Description: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she moves from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit.

Name: Freaky Friday
Description: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

Name: Kangaroo Jack
Description: Two childhood friends, a New York hairstylist and a would-be musician, get caught up with the mob and are forced to deliver $50,000 to Australia, but things go haywire when the money is lost to a wild kangaroo.

Name: Nightbooks
Description: Alex, a boy obsessed with scary stories, is imprisoned by an evil young witch in her contemporary New York City apartment.

Name: Jingle All the Way
Description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Name: House Arrest
Description: Desperate to keep their various parents from getting divorced, a group of teenagers kidnaps them and holds them prisoner in a basement to force them to reconcile.

Name: Greater
Description: The story of Brandon Burlsworth, possibly the greatest walk-on in the history of college football.

Name: Harold and the Purple Crayon
Description: A young boy named Harold embarks on a magical mission with the help of his purple crayon

Name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
Description: A Heffley family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to get to a video gaming convention.

Name: Furry Vengeance
Description: In the Oregon wilderness, a real-estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.

Name: Mighty Joe Young
Description: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.

Name: The Little Vampire
Description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

Name: Steven Universe: The Movie
Description: Steven thinks his time defending the Earth is over, but when a new threat comes to Beach City, Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.

Name: Missing Link
Description: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

Name: Smallfoot
Description: High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.

Name: Kung Fu Yoga
Description: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

Name: The Christmas Chronicles
Description: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

Name: SpaceCamp
Description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

Name: The Thief of Bagdad
Description: After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne, the city, and the Princess he loves.

Name: RocketMan
Description: Fred Z. Randall is a geeky spacecraft designer who gets the chance to make his dream come true and travel to Mars.

Name: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
Description: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow, and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing humans, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, searching for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.

Name: Beethoven's 2nd
Description: Beethoven, the St. Bernard dog, becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dognapped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

Name: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
Description: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

Name: Snow Day
Description: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

Name: 102 Dalmatians
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Name: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
Description: A time traveling scientist goes back to prehistoric times and feeds dinosaurs a magic cereal that increases their intelligence - next they land in modern New York City for a series of comic adventures.

Name: Playing with Fire
Description: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

Name: Playmobil: The Movie
Description: When her younger brother Charlie unexpectedly disappears into the magical, animated universe of PLAYMOBIL®, unprepared Marla must go on a quest of a lifetime to bring him home, setting off on a fantastic journey across stunning new worlds.

Name: Old Dogs
Description: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead them to be the temporary guardians of seven year-old twins.

Name: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
Description: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

Name: Rock-A-Doodle
Description: In order to defeat the wicked Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy, transformed into a cat, teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find the rooster who can raise the sun.

Name: Ernest Goes to Camp
Description: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

Name: Elmer, the Great
Description: Country bumpkin Elmer Kane joins the Chicago Cubs as the greatest hitter in baseball. His skill with a bat takes the team to the World Series, but on the way to the championship he has to deal with gamblers and crooked pitchers.

Name: The Garbage Pail Kids Movie
Description: Dodger must confront the struggles of life as he is visited by the Garbage Pail Kids and intimidated by some older bullies.

Name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
Description: After six years of keeping our malls safe, Paul Blart has earned a well-deserved vacation. He heads to Las Vegas with his teenage daughter before she heads off to college. But safety never takes a holiday and when duty calls, Blart answers.

Name: Thunderstruck
Description: When Brian, a hopelessly uncoordinated young fan magically switches talents with his hero, basketball star Kevin Durant, he becomes the star of his high school team, while Kevin Durant suddenly can't make a shot to save his life.

Name: Curious George
Description: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

Name: Thunderbirds
Description: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

Name: The Kid
Description: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

Name: Madeline
Description: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

Name: The Transformers: The Movie
Description: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Name: The Secret of Kells
Description: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

Name: A Christmas Story Christmas
Description: Follows the now-adult Ralphie as he returns to the house on Cleveland Street to give his kids a magical Christmas like the one he had as a child, reconnecting with childhood friends, and reconciling the passing of his Old Man.

Name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
Description: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

Name: Rock Dog
Description: When a radio falls from the sky into the hands of a wide-eyed Tibetan Mastiff, he leaves home to fulfill his dream of becoming a musician, setting into motion a series of completely unexpected events.

Name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
Description: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

Name: Escape to Witch Mountain
Description: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

Name: Meet Dave
Description: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Name: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
Description: A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent her plan.

Name: Good Burger 2
Description: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 1997 film 'Good Burger'.

Name: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
Description: The young apprentice of a magical, eccentric toy store owner learns to believe in herself, and in her friends, upon learning some grave news about the future.

Name: Hotel for Dogs
Description: Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.

Name: My Favorite Martian
Description: A Martian lands on Earth and makes friends with a reporter.

Name: The Wild
Description: An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.

Name: Problem Child 2
Description: The worst child in the world makes an unthinkable discovery: there is another child even worse than he is--and it's a girl.

Name: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
Description: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

Name: Asterix at the Olympic Games
Description: Astérix and Obélix compete at the Olympics in order to help their friend Lovesix marry Princess Irina. Brutus also tries to win the game with his own team and get rid of his father Julius Caesar.

Name: Little Eggs: An African Rescue
Description: Toto and his friends must rescue his egg children after they're taken away for a gourmet food event in Africa.

Name: The Swan Princess
Description: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

Name: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet
Description: Tad accidentally unleashes an ancient spell, endangering the lives of his friends Mummy, Jeff, and Belzoni. With everyone against him and only helped by Sara, he sets off on an adventure to end the Curse of the Mummy.

Name: Strange Magic
Description: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

Name: A Christmas Carol
Description: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Name: Shrek the Musical
Description: Make room for ogre-sized family fun as the greatest fairy tale never told comes to life in a whole new way in this breathtaking Broadway musical adaptation of the hit movie Shrek!

Name: The Rugrats Movie
Description: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

Name: How to Train Your Dragon
Description: Follows a young Viking as he aspires to hunt dragons, and how he becomes unexpectedly a friend of a young dragon.

Name: Muppet Treasure Island
Description: The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

Name: Tarzan
Description: Tarzan and Jane Porter face a mercenary army dispatched by the evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, a man who took over the company from Tarzan's parents, after they died in a helicopter crash.

Name: The Royal Treatment
Description: New York hairdresser Izzy seizes the chance to work at the wedding of a charming prince, but when sparks between them fly, will love or duty prevail?

Name: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
Description: Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.

Name: Aliens in the Attic
Description: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

Name: Mars Needs Moms
Description: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.

Name: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
Description: After her father's ship is carried off by a sudden storm, the spunky Pippi Longstocking is stranded with her horse, Alfonso, and monkey, Mr. Nilsson, and takes up residence in the old family home, which is thought by neighborhood children to be haunted. Soon, two children, Tommy and Annika, venture into the house only to meet up with Pippi. The three soon become frien... Read all

Name: Patrick the Pug
Description: Sarah is a young woman whose life is in a bit of a mess. The last thing she needs is someone else to look after. Yet, like it or not, her Grandmother has bequeathed her a very spoiled pug - Patrick. Surely she must have had her reasons?.

Name: Fat Albert
Description: Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.

Name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 4
Description: The fourth installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.

Name: The Adventures of Rocky & Bullwinkle
Description: When enemies Boris, Natasha, and Fearless Leader escape into the real world with a nefarious scheme, Rocky and Bullwinkle do the same, and team up with a young F.B.I. Agent to stop the trio.

Name: Monster Family
Description: Despite the title, the Wishbone family are far from happy. In an attempt to reconnect as a family, Mum and Emma plan a fun night out. However, her plan backfires when an evil witch curses them, and they're all turned into Monsters.

Name: It Happens Every Spring
Description: A scientist discovers a formula that makes a baseball which is repelled by wood. He promptly sets out to exploit his discovery.

Name: Trouble
Description: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children.

Name: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
Description: After his principal (Andy Daly) destroys his sketchbook, Rafe (Griffin Gluck) and his best friend Leo (Thomas Barbusca) decide to "destroy his book" and break every rule in the school's Code of Conduct.

Name: The Love Bug
Description: Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

Name: Planes: Fire & Rescue
Description: When Dusty learns that his engine is damaged and he may never race again, he joins a forest fire and rescue unit to be trained as a firefighter, or else his air strip will be shut down.

Name: Surf Ninjas
Description: Two boys learn from a mysterious warrior that they are the heirs to the throne of Patusan and set out to overthrow the current monarchy.

Name: Olsen-banden deruda'
Description: Benny, Keld and computer savvy Georg await old Egon Olsen at his release from prison. Egon has a new plan - theft of USD10,000,000 in Copenhagen. It involves the EEC's (before EU) butter mountain.

Name: Little Big League
Description: A young boy is bequeathed the ownership of a professional baseball team.

Name: Animal Crackers
Description: A family must use a magical box of Animal Crackers to save a run-down circus from being taken over by their evil uncle Horatio P. Huntington.

Name: Parental Guidance
Description: Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

Name: Foodfight!
Description: The evil Brand X joins a supermarket that becomes a city after closing time.

Name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
Description: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

Name: Planet 51
Description: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

Name: Mom and Dad Save the World
Description: An alien Overlord plans to blow up the Earth but first, he snatches and proposes to marry an Earthman's wife.

Name: Darby O'Gill and the Little People
Description: A wily old codger matches wits with the King of the Leprechauns and helps play matchmaker for his daughter and the strapping lad who has replaced him as caretaker.

Name: Cats Don't Dance
Description: Danny, an ambitious singing and dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.

Name: Ratchet & Clank
Description: When the galaxy comes under the threat of a nefarious space captain, a mechanic and his newfound robot ally join an elite squad of combatants to save the universe.

Name: Killer Bean Forever
Description: Killer Bean is sent on a mission in Beantown, but when he attacks one of the warehouses owned by the mafia boss, Cappuccino, he gets the attention of Detective Cromwell, a bean who's trying to put Cappuccino, and possibly Killer Bean, behind bars.

Name: Nancy Drew
Description: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

Name: Family Camp
Description: When two polar-opposite families are forced to camp together, the dads struggle to hold onto their families and marriages as they compete for the coveted camp trophy.

Name: Little Rascals: Best of Our Gang
Description: Spanky, Buckwheat, Porky and all The Little Rascals at their hilarious best!

Name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Description: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

Name: Pinocchio: A True Story
Description: Young Pinocchio runs away from his genius creator Jepetto accompanied by the horse Tibalt to see the world and joins the traveling circus run by hustler Modjafocco.

Name: Home Sweet Home Alone
Description: A married couple tries to steal back a valuable heirloom from a troublesome kid.

Name: Bigfoot Family
Description: Follow up to Son of Bigfoot: Father uses his new fame to fight against an Alaska oil company but when he disappears the son, the mother, a raccoon and a bear head North to rescue him.

Name: Open Season 2
Description: After falling head over hooves in love with Giselle, Elliot's road to the altar takes a slight detour when Mr. Weenie is kidnapped by a group of pampered pets determined to return him to his owners.

Name: The Watcher in the Woods
Description: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.

Name: Snow Dogs
Description: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

Name: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
Description: Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.

Name: The Black Stallion
Description: After being shipwrecked with a magnificent horse off the coast of Africa in the 1940s, a boy bonds with the stallion, and trains him to race after their rescue.

Name: Extinct
Description: Op and Ed accidentally time-travel from the Galapagos Islands in 1835 to present-day Shanghai. They make their way through the city in confusion and make the horrifying discovery that the species to which they belong became extinct shortly after.

Name: The Tale of Despereaux
Description: An unusually brave mouse helps to restore happiness to a forlorn kingdom after making friends with a gentleman rat.

Name: That Darn Cat!
Description: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an S.O.S., the F.B.I. assigns a cat-allergic Agent to the case.

Name: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
Description: The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.

Name: Pee-wee's Big Holiday
Description: A fateful meeting with a mysterious stranger inspires Pee-wee Herman to take his first holiday ever in this epic story of friendship and destiny.

Name: Man of the House
Description: A young boy refuses to accept his mother's new boyfriend, a lawyer, despite the man's attempts to win his respect. Meanwhile, disgruntled relative of a criminal he prosecuted seek revenge.

Name: Little Nemo: Adventures in Slumberland
Description: Each night, young Nemo goes to Slumberland and has adventures and befriends the king of Slumberland, Morpheus. But one night Nemo discovers Nightmare Land, and the evil nightmare king, throwing Slumberland and Nemo himself into danger.

Name: Flora & Ulysses
Description: When Flora rescues a squirrel she names Ulysses, she is amazed to discover he possesses unique superhero powers, which take them on an adventure of humorous complications that ultimately change Flora's life and her outlook forever.

Name: The Tiger Rising
Description: A young boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home.

Name: Stormbreaker
Description: After the death of his uncle, the 14-year-old schoolboy Alex Rider is forced by the Special Operations Division of the UK's secret intelligence service, MI6, into a mission which will save millions of lives.

Name: Untitled Shrek Reboot
Description: Plot unknown. A reboot of the epic animated 'Shrek' franchise.

Name: Chickenhare and the Hamster of Darkness
Description: Follows a young hero born half chicken and half hare. Eager to fit in and feel loved in spite of his differences, he is obsessed by adventuring in spite of his clumsiness.

Name: Catch That Kid
Description: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

Name: Flipper
Description: A teenage boy sent to spend the summer with his eccentric uncle on the Florida coast befriends a remarkable dolphin and takes on local bad guys who are polluting the water.

Name: Underdog
Description: A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.

Name: Magic Camp
Description: At the urging of his former mentor and Magic Camp owner Roy Preston, Andy returns as a counselor to the camp of his youth hoping to reignite his career.

Name: Treasure Island
Description: The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate captain Long John Silver.

Name: The Santa Clause 2
Description: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

Name: The Apple Dumpling Gang
Description: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.
